description: This file defines an in-memory repository for Note objects, implementing basic CRUD operations such as listing, adding, updating, deleting, and clearing notes. It optionally seeds the repository with sample notes during initialization.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A class providing in-memory storage and management of notes with thread-safe operations, supporting optional seeding of sample notes.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns all notes sorted by title (case-insensitive) and then by id for stable order.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Creates a new note with the given title and body, stores it, and returns the created note.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns true if successful, false if the note does not exist.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its id; returns true if a note was removed.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes all notes from the repository, typically used in testing.
